name: Watch Servicing and other Modification Services
description:
Thank you for choosing Neckyzips to complete your horological project.

You have reached our online store to process your payment via paypal.   

Navigating our store is very simple and easy to use.

1) To choose a product or service, choose from the categories listed on the right of the page.
2) Once you have chosen the category, choose from the available options in the click down box to add that part or service to your cart.
3) To add multiple products or services, simply choose another category, choose your option in the click down box and add to your cart.
4) Repeat until you have added all products or services to your cart.
5) Choose your country to determine shipping then update total for the total amount billed to your paypal account.
6) Click check out to be transferred to your paypal account.    Log in to paypal and send.    Its just that simple.

IF YOUR GET LOST
1) Click on the neckyzips banner to return to the stores home page

TO RETURN TO NECKYZIPS.COM
1) If at any time you'd like to return to my website to see more pictures or read about any other topics, simply click on "return to site" in small letters at the top of the page and you will be returned to neckyzips.com

QUESTIONS?
If you have questions about the checkout process or would like info about a specific project or for a free quote, simply click on the contact link in the lower right of the page under the INFO heading and you can send me a message.     I will respond within 24 hours.

Thanks

-NZ
6) COn your right, youSimply choose your options from those listed below and add to your cart.   You can choose to add additional services simply.

Just choose your service and click add to cart

If you want an additional service performed, just add an additional service to your cart.

Feel free to contact me with any questions or if you have any problems with the process.

Thanks for visiting and I hope to hear from you soon.

-CC
